name: Giovannino's garden
description:
Explore your cute neighborhood and try to unravel all of its secrets...  

 

Developer notes

Small little game I made entirely by myself using Unity!
There's not much to do for now, it was mostly to experiment and train myself with art style, animations and 2D characters programming, I did well in my opinion!
Tell my what you think about it!
I used animations I made during a gam jam, I wanted to finish them with this project.
